Game.Name: Dr. Mario & Panel de Pon (Japan)
Game.plot: Dr. Mario requires equal parts strategy and speed to achieve victory. Delete viruses by throwing vitamin capsules into a bottle. Since many viruses are trapped at the bottom of the bottle, you must plan ahead in order to eliminate them.In Puzzle League, you'll form a chain of three or more same-colored blocks. When you match up shapes, the blocks on top will fall onto other matching blocks, but if you can't make a match, the blocks rise to the top of the screen. This game also has unusual depth in terms of options and settings which lets players create a custom game experience.Cheat: Horizontal Playing Field ModeFor both Panel de Pon/Puzzle League/Tetris Attack and Dr. Mario, there is an unlockable mode where the playing field is flipped ninety degrees so that you have to turn the GBA on its side to play. The graphics are enlarged to see the field better.Cheat: Horizontal Playing Field ModeNOTE: These modes work best on a Game Boy Micro or original GBA.Cheat: Horizontal Playing Field ModeComplete 1-player Line mode (by beating level 6-5) to unlock Vertical Mode. This will allow you to play Marathon, Timed, and Garbage in Vertical Mode.Cheat: Horizontal Playing Field ModeBeat the 20th lvl in Dr. Mario in Classic Mode.
